Nov. 17 Experienced manager and production director in both commercial
and educational television desires position with new educational TV
station or with college or university radio and television department.
Background includes 20 years of experience in the field. Undergraduate
degree in electronics; doctorate in education. Qualified to teach all
phases of radio and TV production and management, as well as graduate
courses in communications and communications research. Metropolitan
area preferred. Salary should be commensurate with that offered for
corresponding responsibility in commercial TV. Presently employed in
large university*.

vant courses at Columbia and llichigan. No military obligations. Per¬
sonable, versatile, creative. Supervisory directing experience at col¬
lege and summer camp*
Nov. 19 Young man - 27, single; experience in commercial PH ”good music”
station as announcer, music commentator and member of program dept;;
3.S. in Political Science, M.A. in Iiusic; high scholarship; editor,
college literary magazine; concert experience as pianist and composer;
excellent references. Hill consider part-time teaching in connection
with position.
Nov. 20 Young man, 27, seeks position as writer, director and/or pro¬
ducer of educational TV programs. Three college degrees, widely travel¬
ed, four years college teaching (drama) experience. Knowledge and
practical experience of TV production techniques.
Nov. 21 You want a practical administrator and broadcaster who knows
the big picture as well as the details from the inside of commercial
